content: Investments Stocks Asked by AnonymousAsked on 09 Apr 2019How do investors stay updated with IPO/stock news? Are there any good websites/tools that we can subscribe to that will deliver such news to our emails?2 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Junus EuTop Contributor (Sep)Level 8. WizardAnswered on 24 May 2019When I was working as an equities analyst - I had the usual triple screen Bloomberg set-up to reference daily. Because of that, I was able to check the news and stock movements every morning, so much so that it was the replacement for reading the papers in the morning. If there are specific companies that you are interested in, you can easily set up alerts for it!0 comments0

Ashley Wong, Financial Assistant at Multi Management & Future SolutionsLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 09 Apr 2019Yes, you can stay upated with latest ipo/stock news. Sites like marketwatch can help. You should check out.0 comments0
